name: aluminium around steel bi-metal stranded cable production, 3x3.67mm external diameter wire | aluminium around steel bi-metal stranded cable, 3x3.67mm external diameter wire | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/12990/documentation

This dataset represents the production of an aluminium around steel bi-metal stranded cable. Typically, 3, 7, 19 or 37 aluminium around steel bi-metal wires are stranded together.;This dataset represents a 3 x 3.67 mm external diameter wire cable but the dataset is parameterized to the number and diameter of wires so new instances can be created for other numbers of wires.

From the reception of the material inputs at the factory gate.

This activity ends with the aluminium around steel bi-metal stranded cable.
This dataset only includes the length of aluminium around steel bi-metal wire necessary per m of stranded cable depending on the number of individual wires in the cable. No losses are accounted for during the stranding process.
category: C:Manufacturing/25:Manufacture of fabricated metal products, except machinery and equipment/259:Manufacture of other fabricated metal products; metalworking service activit/2599:Manufacture of other fabricated metal products n.e.c.

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data from one cable manufacturing company in the region of Québec. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This dataset has been extrapolated from an original regional dataset covering the geography Québec. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Industry data from one manufacturing company in the region of Québec.

flow.name: aluminium around steel bi-metal stranded cable, 3x3.67mm external diameter wire
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/25:Manufacture of fabricated metal products, except machinery and equipment/259:Manufacture of other fabricated metal products; metalworking service activit/2599:Manufacture of other fabricated metal products n.e.c.

exchanges.description: Calculated value. Polynomial function relationship between the total length (in m) of bi-metal wire per m of cable and the number of wires (or strands) in the cable derived from the mass-to-length data for different cable and individual wire types manfuctured by the data providing company. The R² value of the regression is of 1.00. Gives an error of from less than 0,01% for a 3-wire cable to 0,12% for a 37-wire cable.
